mapper.select: /* LoginMapper.findByEmail 이메일, 비밀번호로 사용자 조회 */ SELECT USER_NO AS userNo , EMAIL AS email , USER_NAME AS userName , PASSWORD AS password , ADMIN_YN AS adminYn , LOCK_YN AS lockYn , LOCK_DATE AS lockDate , REG_DATE AS regDate FROM TB_USER WHERE EMAIL = #{email} AND PASSWORD = #{password}
